HDG.IM.content: emptiness of word “Being,” complete withering of its naming force, not just particular case of general abuse of language: the destroyed relation to Being as such [the name?] is real ground for whole misrelation to language [how do you know this if you haven’t answered Nietzsche yet?] [if it is exemplary, what does the particular name matter?]

HDG.IM.linkedContent: emptiness of word “Being,” complete withering of its naming force, not just particular case of general abuse of language: the destroyed relation to Being as such [the name?] is real ground for whole misrelation to language [how do you know this if you haven’t answered Nietzsche yet?] [if it is exemplary, what does the particular name matter?]

HDG.BC.content: constraint of Being forces beings into Being, Being plays around & through us
HDG.BC.linkedContent: constraint of Being forces beings into Being, Being plays around & through us

HDG.QB.content: to connect “work” & “pain”: think fundamental trait of Hegel’s metaphysics: “absolute negativity” as “infinite force” of actuality, i.e., of the “existing concept” > work & pain manifest their innermost metaphysical relatedness in same (not identical) belonging to negation of negation
HDG.QB.linkedContent: to connect “work” & “pain”: think fundamental trait of Hegel’s metaphysics: “absolute negativity” as “infinite force” of actuality, i.e., of the “existing concept” > work & pain manifest their innermost metaphysical relatedness in same (not identical) belonging to negation of negation

HDG.QB.content: “attempt to cross the line” captivated in form of representation (in ein Vorstellen gebannt) belonging to dominion (Herrschaftsbereich) of oblivion of Being > subject to doubts, like every image > but these doubts (Zweifeln) can’t touch illuminative force of images, their originary/uncircumventable presence (ursprüngliche und unumgehbare Gegenwart)—shows how little experience we have in the saying of thinking (der Sage des Denkens), in essence of such saying
HDG.QB.linkedContent: “attempt to cross the line” captivated in form of representation (in ein Vorstellen gebannt) belonging to dominion (Herrschaftsbereich) of oblivion of Being > subject to doubts, like every image > but these doubts (Zweifeln) can’t touch illuminative force of images, their originary/uncircumventable presence (ursprüngliche und unumgehbare Gegenwart)—shows how little experience we have in the saying of thinking (der Sage des Denkens), in essence of such saying

HDG.FS.content: Hegel: “a torn sock is better then a mended one…” > to understand (Verstehen), must see (sehen) phenomenologically, invitation to phenomenological “kindergarten”: to tear apart (Zer-reissen), to tear in 2 parts, to separate, make 2 out of 1: torn sock no longer present-at-hand [sock appears outside its usage, w/ more force (Kraft)] > diese Einheit [the unity of the whole sock] ist im Zerrissensein [being-torn] als verlorene [lost] Einheit gegenwärtig
HDG.FS.linkedContent: Hegel: “a torn sock is better then a mended one…” > to understand (Verstehen), must see (sehen) phenomenologically, invitation to phenomenological “kindergarten”: to tear apart (Zer-reissen), to tear in 2 parts, to separate, make 2 out of 1: torn sock no longer present-at-hand [sock appears outside its usage, w/ more force (Kraft)] > diese Einheit [the unity of the whole sock] ist im Zerrissensein [being-torn] als verlorene [lost] Einheit gegenwärtig

HDG.FS.content: if “scission (Ent-zweiung)” is source (Quell) of need for philosophy, if philosophy arises as soon as it is torn, “what is the driving force (treibende Kraft) of the dichotomy (Entzweiung)? > if tearing is necessary, can one speak of unity before tearing?

motif.name: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]
motif.title: SACRIFICE [to define, philosophy of life required]

HDG.FS.linkedContent: if “scission (Ent-zweiung)” is source (Quell) of need for philosophy, if philosophy arises as soon as it is torn, “what is the driving force (treibende Kraft) of the dichotomy (Entzweiung)? > if tearing is necessary, can one speak of unity before tearing?

HDG.FS.content: driving force of subject-object dichotomy: quest for absolute certainty (Gewissheit), interpreting truth as certainty > Descartes’ ego cogito, as upokeimenon, subjectum, fundamentum inconcussum, henceforth, nature only appears as Object for a Subject > prelude to this advent: Luther’s quest for certainty in faith, Galileo’s search for mathematical certainty of nature, all prepared by nominalist separation of words/things, Ockham’s formalism makes possible project (Entwurf) of mathematical key (Schlüssels) to world > grasp in one concept: unity of mathematical certainty & certainty of salvation
HDG.FS.linkedContent: driving force of subject-object dichotomy: quest for absolute certainty (Gewissheit), interpreting truth as certainty > Descartes’ ego cogito, as upokeimenon, subjectum, fundamentum inconcussum, henceforth, nature only appears as Object for a Subject > prelude to this advent: Luther’s quest for certainty in faith, Galileo’s search for mathematical certainty of nature, all prepared by nominalist separation of words/things, Ockham’s formalism makes possible project (Entwurf) of mathematical key (Schlüssels) to world > grasp in one concept: unity of mathematical certainty & certainty of salvation

HDG.MA.content: decisive question: how can we tame vast atomic energies, secure mankind against their danger > technological advance will move faster & faster, can’t be stopped > man hasn’t made forces of technology [?], they’ve moved beyond his will, outgrown his capacity for decision

motif.name: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY
motif.title: BEYOND ECONOMY / SURPLUS VALUE / GENERAL ECONOMY

HDG.MA.linkedContent: decisive question: how can we tame vast atomic energies, secure mankind against their danger > technological advance will move faster & faster, can’t be stopped > man hasn’t made forces of technology [?], they’ve moved beyond his will, outgrown his capacity for decision

HDG.LP.content: Trakl silently sounds the mystery (Geheimnis) > the unity (Einheit) of “One Generation (Ein Geschlecht),” arises (entquillt) from the race (Schlag) that gathers along path of stranger, enfolds discord of generations into gentler two-fold > One of One Generation, not opposed to two but hidden unifying force [indifference point?] > Geschlecht names historical generation of man, mankind as distinct (Unterschied) from all other living creatures, names race, tribes, clans, families, & always refers to twofoldness of sexes

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.LP.linkedContent: Trakl silently sounds the mystery (Geheimnis) > the unity (Einheit) of “One Generation (Ein Geschlecht),” arises (entquillt) from the race (Schlag) that gathers along path of stranger, enfolds discord of generations into gentler two-fold > One of One Generation, not opposed to two but hidden unifying force [indifference point?] > Geschlecht names historical generation of man, mankind as distinct (Unterschied) from all other living creatures, names race, tribes, clans, families, & always refers to twofoldness of sexes

HDG.LP.content: [program] all formulas are dangerous: force what’s said into superficiality (Äusserlichkeit) of instant opinion (raschen Meninens), can corrupt thinking > but can also prompt sustained reflection
HDG.LP.linkedContent: [program] all formulas are dangerous: force what’s said into superficiality (Äusserlichkeit) of instant opinion (raschen Meninens), can corrupt thinking > but can also prompt sustained reflection

HDG.EC.content: standpoint of superiority (überlegeneren Standort) an attitude that no longer pays heed (kehrt) to devastation: a will of aversion (Widerwille) forces us to morally evaluate devastation
HDG.EC.linkedContent: standpoint of superiority (überlegeneren Standort) an attitude that no longer pays heed (kehrt) to devastation: a will of aversion (Widerwille) forces us to morally evaluate devastation

HDG.OHF.content: objective scientific type of philosophy: proper refuge (Schutzwehr) in which Dasein protected from abysmal (bodenlosen) relativism, finds a secure foothold, brings objective possibility of more objective agreement (Übereinstimmung), “All of us…”, i.e. presents Dasein w/ tranquil certainty/security (ruhige Sicherheit) of general/unanimous “yes, I agree” [a force against snarl of worldviews, & rampant skepticism of our day] > when the system is dynamic has character of life itself, simultaneously universal & concrete [not subjective]
